channel.title: CVE Feed for Eaton -- Secure Connect Mobile App
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Eaton -- Secure Connect Mobile App

item.title: CVE-2020-6653|2024-09-17T00:47:05.180Z -- eaton -- secure%20connect%20mobile%20app
item.description: Eaton's Secure connect mobile app v1.7.3 & prior stores the user login credentials in logcat file when user create or register the account on the Mobile app. A malicious app or unauthorized user can harvest the information and later on can use the information to monitor and control the user's account and associated devices.
